name: Strike
desc: 15% chance to deal 150% DMG when attacking

name: Double Shot
desc: 25% chance to shoot 2 arrows at once when attacking

name: Mini Spell
desc: 20% chance to deal 250% DMG to enemies within range when attacking

name: Smash
desc: Applies CRIT hit on every 3 attacks

name: Snowball
desc: Attacks reduce the enemy's MOV SPD by 20% for 3s

name: Inspire
desc: 15% chance to increases nearby allies' ATK by 20% for 5s when attacking

name: Daze
desc: 15% chance to stun the enemy for 1s when attacking

name: Shatter Armor
desc: 35% chance to make the enemy take 20% more damage for 5s when attacking

name: Boom Fist
desc: 15% chance to deal 270% DMG to enemies within range when attacking

name: Bounty
desc: 10% chance to gain 1 gem when attacking

name: Bone Shard
desc: Deals 150% DMG to 5 enemies within range every 3s

name: Plagueburst
desc: 18% chance to deal 500% DMG to enemies within range when attacking

name: Command
desc: Increases all allies' ATK SPD by 20%

name: Longshot
desc: Fires 3 arrows every 3s,each dealing 300% DMG

name: Sword Rain
desc: 15% chance to deal 800% DMG to enemies within range when attacking

name: Ashen Aura
desc: Enemies within attack range take 20% more damage

name: Burning Spirit
desc: Killing an enemy grants double ATK for 2s

name: Blazing Fist
desc: 15% chance to stun the enemy for 2s when attacking

name: Bloodrage
desc: Increases ATK SPD by 10% for 5s per enemy killed, stacking up to 5 times

name: Cleaving Axe
desc: The 5th attack becomes a guaranteed critical hit dealing area damage

name: Bountiful Harvest
desc: At the end of each wave, 30% chance to gain 5 golds

name: Chivalry
desc: Increases all allies' ATK by 10%, CRIT rate by 5%

name: Slime Slash
desc: 15% chance to release a sword wave that deals 1500% DMG to enemies in its path and slows them by 30% for 5s when attacking

name: Sword Master
desc: Increases CRIT DMG by 50%. For each level of equipped swords combined, gain an additional 5% CRIT DMG

name: Soulflare
desc: Increases ATK by +10 for each enemy killed

name: Candlehold
desc: 10% chance to deal 2000% DMG to enemies within range and immobilize them for 3s when attacking

name: Warpflame
desc: Every 10s, summons 4 twisted matter that last for 5s, dealing 600% DMG and slowing enemies by 20% on contact

name: Serenity Aura
desc: Increases all allies' ATK by 5%, ATK SPD by 5%, CRIT DMG by 10%

name: Peaceful Wave
desc: Reduces enemies to 40 if >=50 are on the field (once only)

name: Hope's Light
desc: 15% chance to increases an ally ATK by 10%, CRIT rate by 5% for 6s when attacking

name: Cower
desc: Reduces all enemies' MOV SPD by 5%

name: Harvest Soul
desc: 5% chance to instantly kill a non-full health enemy (does not affect elites and bosses)

name: Phantom Sweep
desc: 10% chance to deal 700% DMG to enemies within range when attacking

name: Dragonfall
desc: Upon summoning, deals 3000% DMG to all enemies

name: Nestguard
desc: When there are more than 30 enemies on the field, ATK increases by 20%

name: Abyssal Roar
desc: 10% chance to deal 1500% DMG  + 10% of max HP to enemies within range when attacking

name: Flame Breath
desc: Every 20 attacks, shoots 3 fireballs, each dealing 2500% DMG to enemies within range

name: Snap
desc: When a wave begins, 5% chance to wipe out half of the enemies

name: Time Control
desc: Extends all WAVEs by 3s

name: Infinity
desc: Every 8s, replaces normal attacks with a 1000% DMG area attack, lasting until an enemy dies
